profile_squares.text2:
Oliver and Ursa Lyrics:

Oliver he wants the world
At his feet but he's set his mind on flying
In the night sky he met a girl
Who made him feel like he wasn't trying

He loves Ursa
But he's just chasing stars
Playing connect the dots
With pieces of her heart

Oliver heart on his sleeve
No good at playing games with a cool, coy damsel
Caught his eye in less than a week
He was just a code that she couldn't unscramble
